  • Open the Accessibility settings menu in System Settings.
  • Click on Revolution Macro.
  • Scroll to the bottom and press the minus (-) button.
  • Press the plus (+) button.
  • Add Revolution Macro from your Applications folder.
After completing these steps, the macro should regain accessibility permissions and function normally.
